nodes.text: There are quite a few gems in there. Quite a few people who God supposedly 'divinely' helped, but he didn't mention any problem with their polygamy (700+300!), incest, etc? And that's not counting the examples of him ordering genocide, but sparing the virgin women so they could become baby factories... ... or ordering a policy whereby if a woman is raped, the rapist gets to pay a few shekels and marry the rape victim.... emoticon_xdonno

Well, that's because all those things happened during the Age of Law (the god of swift and harsh justice bit), whereas now we're in the Age of Grace (the god is all-forgiving bit), so . . . . er . . . hang on a minute.
